entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Strange behavior between Release and Debug builds [Random access violations and null exceptions] #78839
  • Breaking change: The behaviour of System.IO.Path.GetFullPath has changed for some reserved filenames. #78834
  • [Mono][Android] App crashes with InvalidProgramException #78833
    8.0.0
  • net7.0 app crashes in ProfilerAddNewRegion after profiler attach #78831
    8.0.0
  • Synchronous calls in XsdValidatingReader #78802
  • Process.GetProcessesByName() error on linux #78800
  • Build support for unknown archs - Loongarch in my case #78797
  • How to disable building of Mono on Loongarch #78796

Closed

  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 10/13/2022 2:25:23 AM #78806
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 10/13/2022 5:08:18 AM #78808
  • [API Proposal]: Align System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.DllCharacteristics with PE spec #71362
    8.0.0
  • Dereferencing before `null` checks #78634
    8.0.0
  • Iterating large queue throws exception #78590
    8.0.0
  • GregorianCalendarHelper, suspicious `%` operator #78627
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 11/7/2022 8:57:30 PM #78819
  • [wasm] consider bumping devDependencies #78708
  • Printing error messages in CoreCLR #9419
    Future
  • Cannot export certificate data even with X509KeyStorageFlags.Exportable #77590
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194/Runtime_76194.sh #78791
  • System.IO.Compression bug #78264
  • Command line arguments not parsing with section #57568
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Make sure s_currentGenerationTable is safe for profiler attach #78841
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Add a managed cache for flags in RuntimeType. #78840
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Disable CG on Linux musl installer jobs too #78832
  • Enable basic Kept validation in NativeAOT running linker tests #78828
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map #78818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT DivToMul test #78816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable mark phase prefetching for segments #78803
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Convert pointers in a couple tables to relative #78801
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add mechanism for runtime to query host for information #78798
    area-Host
  • Place non-GC statics in the dehydratable section #78795
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consolidate approach for conditional tests that check for privileged processes #78793
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Alternative fix for GC pal linking (without the size_t related change for MacOS) #78792
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.2
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • SIMDify ToLowerInvariant/ToUpperInvariant #78262
  • Implement Equals & GetHashCode for LingerOption - fix Socket outerloop tests #78747
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add `DllCharacteristics.ForceIntegrity` and `ControlFlowGuard`. #78072
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • linux-requirements.md: add missing line-continuation #78476
    area-Meta
  • Clarify docs for Leading/TrailingZeroCount #78510
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix some duplicative null checks #78727
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix arithmetic overflow in Queue<T>'s MoveNext() #78600
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary % in ToFourDigitYear #78728
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] bump devDependencies to rollup 3 and TypeScript 4.9 #78726
    area-Build-mono
  • Bigger workitem timeout (for perf slow pipeline) #78632
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove pointer relocs from GC statics #78794
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Runtime_76194 test #78760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2052742 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Fold const RVA access (via const index) #78783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for serializing properties in interface hierarchies #78788
    enhancement, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Update a few dependencies #78710
  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #78339
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Change MetricSpec.TryParse to be Parse #78729
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Use `init-os-and-arch.sh` in mono samples recipes #78055
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #78755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Set GTF_ORDER_SIDEEFF for some nodes with invisible dependencies #78698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Disable AOTing methods which contain catch clauses insid… #78732
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 7.0.2
  • Add compiler-generated code tests for NativeAot #77457
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • This fixes Github issue 78206 - a heap corruption problem associated with mark stack overflow #78756
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [6.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78670
    Servicing-consider, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [7.0] Fix the tiering delay to account for changing IL/native code versions during the delay #78669
    Servicing-consider, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Aging dependent handles #78746
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    NO-MERGE, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review, 8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 gitignore template miss .idea (JetBrains Rider) exclusion #29224
  • Cannot run `dotnet watch` on Linux #29223
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET 7.0.101 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: (Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.android-arm, 6.0.12) displayed when installing andriod workload in CLI. #29212

Closed

  • dotnet test with msbuild parameter broken in .NET 7 #29227

PullRequests

Created

  • simplified conditions in C# class library template #29221
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new

Merged

  • Adjust test due to different behaviors for disabled parameter between main and release/7.0.2xx #29209
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2052726 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
  • [8.0 -> 7.0.2 Backport] Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28376
    Review for breaking changes
  • Add RidSpecific, Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSharpSyncNamespaceCodeRefactoringProvider does not recognize .editorconfig's csharp_style_namespace_declarations #65603
  • Compilers generated code isn't validated in CI when only source generators are changed #65602
  • [C#] IDE0055 - ident_size 4 is ignored for line of Constructor Initializer #65601
  • Crash inside FlowAnalysis #65597
  • Excessive Roslyn computation in 17.4 possibly related to refs #65596
    17.5
  • [C#] Stack Overflow when a method pointer type appears in an attribute #65594

Closed

  • `var` keyword colorized on the case `scoped var refStruct = expr;` #65403
    17.5
  • Generics implementations with nullable of non struct don't match type #65598
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33123.395 #65599

PullRequests

Created

  • Move "Unseal class" codefix to VerifyCS #65605
    Area-IDE, Community
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65595
    Area-Compilers, Test

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65604
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65600
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65593
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add capability to request fine grained DiagnosticKinds to diagnostic analyzer service #65583
    Area-Analyzers, Next

Updated

  • Support fine-grained diagnostic tagging. #65547
    Area-IDE
  • Rules missing documentation #62242
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor (fail: Microsoft.WebAssembly.Diagnostics.DevToolsProxy[0] sending error response for id) #45271
  • gRPC JSON transcoding — Unable to resolve descriptor for Enum (deserialize enum from string value) #45270
  • Caching: Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis doesn't provide createifnotexist method #45268
  • (BlazorServer) each navigation to external logs 2 errors a minute later #45267
  • Rare "The SSL connection could not be established, see inner exception. Unable to read data from the transport connection: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host.. An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host." #45266
  • Unable to set request body format to binary in minimal api #45265
  • `RouteHandlerBuilder.Accepts` does not return 415 response when the request has no `Content-Type` #45264
  • Quarantine SignalRClientWorksWithWebSockets #45262
  • Add SkipStatusCodePages flag to ApiBehaviorOptions #45260
  • Question : Should Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.HealthChecks extension respond success to HTTP PUT/POST/DELETE methods ? #45258
  • Debug blazor in vscode prompted "cannot launch browser: The URL's protocol must be one of "ws","wss:, or "ws+nuix;""" #45257
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Blazor HtmlRenderer: Use ReadOnlySpan instead of ArrayRange #45259
  • [Spa] Spa proxy enhancements #44638
    8.0-preview1
  • [Feature Request] Merging splatted attributes in Blazor #45230
    Backlog
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-38013: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #43953
    Discussions
  • Routing - cannot change precedence of DynamicRouteValueTransformer #45175
  • NET 6 Blazor WASM Hosted - Query diminishing performance #45100
  • Is there a way to increase the time to refresh the authentication state if RevalidatingIdentityAuthenticationStateProvider is being used? #45245
  • JavaScript to C# argument passing achieves a whopping 235 kb/s of throughput #44088
  • Results.Created returns a relative URI in the location header instead of an absolute (as in classic Web API) #45101
  • Grpc issue in native build of aspnetcore on ppc64le #44859
  • X-Requested-With header is incorrect in FetchHttpClient #44933
  • ASP.NET Core Module v2 17.0.22292.0 Very serious bug #45006

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding id to manifest.json files #45269
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261

Merged

  • Spa proxy enhancements #45232
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Enable `UsePkce` by default for Google and Facebook auth #45235
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Improved Bot Response for investigation issue #45254
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix AzDO area path for policy violations reporting #45255
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2052665 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix for W3C cookie logging #45226
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45256
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet trace gc-collect profile should include private GC events as well #3521

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebAuthenticator doesn't support Azure App Service callback response. #11641
  • ListView ViewCell content disappears when the application enters the foreground #11640
  • ToolbarItems do not work correctly on Windows #11639
  • Add Test for RefreshView / Scrolling #11637
    Backlog
  • Add UI Test for NeedsExactMeasure #11636
    Backlog
  • Listview Binding Data not display (in Release) #11617
    Backlog
  • Removing the NavBar causes a white field to appear in its place #11611
    Backlog
  • Cannot use Japanese text in window title if ExtendsContentIntoTitleBar is false (possibly Windows only) #11610
  • [Net8.0] Enable test tamples with net6 and net7 #11608
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Entry Unfocus not working on Android #11606
    Backlog
  • [net8] Review changes related with DisableResizetizer on net branch #11605
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Disabling a MenuBarItem doesn't stop its sub-items from appearing when clicked #11602
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI style problem with gradient colors - Android #11601
    Backlog
  • Crash on Windows when UseMauiCompatibility is not enabled ("The handler's MauiContext cannot be null.") #11600
    Backlog
  • ListView fails to display correct ViewCell content intermittently #11598
    Backlog
  • I think this is a duplicate of #5652 and I think half the time when files are moved in VS the IDE decides it does not want to track the files and adds an explicit remove for everything. #11596
  • Will there be a window control library similar WPF in the future? #11595
  • Image with authentication header #11594
    Backlog

Closed

  • Metatada file "MyApp.dll" could not be found, on all default solutions on Visual Studio Mac #11567
  • MAUI 7.0 iOS Release build won't install on iOS 16 #11385
  • Running on windows 11 doesn't live up to expectations, but Android is right #11547
    Backlog
  • Very slow Intellisense & Code Completion in MAUI projects #11592
  • iOS app crashes after launch for release build distributed via TestFlight #11349
  • .net maui android app crashes when deployed to google play closed testing #11316
  • Android-.NET6-Style issue when changing the button status (disabled->enabled) #11336
  • Created an APK for Android - My phone says "This type of file is not supported" #11391

PullRequests

Created

  • Only include MauiXaml/Css when $(UseMaui)=true #11638
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Connectivity API Docs #11633
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11613
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11612
  • [Build] Update yaml for net8 #11609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Invalidate Button background drawable if size changes #11604
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Tizen] Add Shell SearchHandler #11597
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Battery API Docs #11626
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Clipboard Docs #11634
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Browser API Docs #11628
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Accelerometer API Docs #11623
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Clipboard Docs #11635
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Contacts API Docs #11630
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Connectivity API Docs #11632
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Contacts API Docs #11631
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Browser API Docs #11629
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Barometer API Docs #11621
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials AppInfo API Docs #11627
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Battery API Docs #11625
  • [net7.0] Remove unnecessary MeasureOverride from RefreshView; #11624
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials Accelerometer API Docs #11622
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Barometer API Docs #11620
  • [net7.0] Fix window events when swapping out a page #11618
  • [net7.0] Add NeedsExactMeasure check for Editor on Android #11619
    do-not-merge
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials AppActions API Docs #11615
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix issue clearing MapElements in Map #11616
  • [net6.0] Update Essentials AppActions API Docs #11614
  • Manual update for .net8 sdk and workloads #11387
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Exclude incompatible files from daily dotnet format workflow #11590
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #11346
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, version/android-13
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix issue correctly updating WrapperView content visibility #11531
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Make iOS Label HTML behavior compatible with Forms #11569
    area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11570
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Different SQL Server DELETE statement in EF Core 7 surfaces SQL Server issue #29673
  • Regression in v7: EqualsExpression in ValueComparer is now called with null even when HasDefaultValueSql is specified #29671
  • GroupBy possibly causes needless duplication of predicate #29670
  • Promote SQL Server bulk insert logic to relational ReaderModificationCommandBatch #29668

Closed

  • HasDiscriminator based on owned value object property #29659
  • Error during EnsureCreate on sqlite db with json columns #29632
  • Compiler warning about System.Text.Json after upgrading to EfCore 7 #29567
  • Invalid ThenInclude() Nullable Reference Type Warning #17212
  • How to inject data into a my dbcontext to dynamically configure the database? #29657
  • DB ContextPooling no Performance gain #29661

PullRequests

Created

  • Support interfaces in ExecuteUpdate setter property lambda #29672
  • Fix SQL Server bulk insert edge case #29669

Updated

  • Fix to #28648 - Json/Query: translate element access of a json array #29656
